title: HEAR IT: Millionaire's Crazy 911 Call After Wife Vanishes
itunes:title: HEAR IT: Millionaire's Crazy 911 Call After Wife Vanishes
description:
Millionaire Peter Chadwick, makes a bizarre 911 call claiming his wife of 21 years is drowned by a house painter named Juan and he was forced to drive her body around all night. That is just the beginning of the mystery of what happened to Q.C. Chadwick.

Nancy's Expert Panel Weighs In:

Wendy Patrick:  Trial Attorney

Dr. Kris Sperry:  Retired Chief Medical Examiner for the State of Georgia  

Caryn Stark:   Psychologist

Steven Lampley:   Former detective

David Mack:  Syndicated Radio Host


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
